casebody.data:
Oppenheimer, Respondent, v. Manhattan Ry. Co. et al., Appellants. (Superior Court of New York City, General Term. March 9, 1891.) Appeal from equity term. Action by Sigmund Oppenheimer against the Manhattan Railway Company and another. From a judgment for plaintiff, defendants appeal.

Argued before Sedgwick, C. J., and Truax and Dugro, JJ.

Davies & Rapallo, for appellants. Leo C. Dessar, for respondent. Per Curiam.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
